title: Sleep log
description: Each entry records daily sleep time.

start_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when start of sleep occured.

start_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when start of sleep occured.

end_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when sleep ended.

end_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when sleep ended.
